DeleteAccount.title: Delete Account
DeleteAccount.subtitle: Permanently remove your account and all associated data from Mythoria

notLoggedIn.title: Account Deletion Instructions
notLoggedIn.description: To delete your account, you need to be logged in first.

steps.title: How to Delete Your Account:
steps.step1: Click on the user icon in the top-right corner of the page
steps.step2: Select 'Manage Account' from the dropdown menu
steps.step4: Click the 'Delete Account' button and follow the confirmation process

loggedIn.title: Delete Your Account
loggedIn.description: This action will permanently delete your account and cannot be undone.

consequences.title: What will be deleted:
consequences.item2: All your created books and stories
consequences.item3: Any pending credits in your account

confirmation.title: Confirm Account Deletion
confirmation.description: This action cannot be undone. To confirm, please enter your email address below.
confirmation.emailMismatch: Email address does not match your account email

warning.title: Warning: This action is irreversible
warning.description: Once your account is deleted, all your data including created books, pending credits, and personal information will be permanently removed and cannot be recovered.

legal.title: Legal Compliance
legal.description: This deletion process complies with GDPR Article 17 (Right to Erasure) and Facebook Platform Terms Section 3(d)(i), ensuring your right to have your personal data removed.

errors.deletionFailed: Account deletion failed. Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
errors.networkError: Network error occurred. Please check your connection and try again.
